api_list.name: Get Show - Episodes By Season and Episode Number
api_list.description:
Retrieve one specific episode from this show given its season number and episode number. 

This either returns the full information for one episode, or a HTTP 404 response.

optional_parameters.name: sn
optional_parameters.description:
Season Number.

Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: en
optional_parameters.description:
Episode Number.

Default is 1.

api_list.name: Get Show Updates
api_list.description:
Get all shows and the timestamp when they were last updated. 

Updating a direct or indirect child of a show will also mark the show itself as updated. 

It's possible to filter the result set to only include shows that have been updated in the past day (24 hours), week, or month.

optional_parameters.name: tbd
optional_parameters.description:
Convert UNIX timestamp (EPOCH time) to Date and transpose result by Date.

Default is false.

optional_parameters.name: s
optional_parameters.description:
Filter based on the following:

0 - Day
1 - Week
2 - Month

optional_parameters.name: ctd
optional_parameters.description:
Convert UNIX timestamp (EPOCH time) to Date.

Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Person Updates
api_list.description:
Get all persons and the timestamp when they were last updated. 

A person is considered to be updated when any of their attributes are changed, but also when a cast- or crew-credit that involves them is created or deleted.

It's possible to filter the result set to only include shows that have been updated in the past day (24 hours), week, or month.

optional_parameters.name: tbd
optional_parameters.description:
Convert UNIX timestamp (EPOCH time) to Date and transpose result by Date.

Default is false.

optional_parameters.name: ctd
optional_parameters.description:
Convert UNIX timestamp (EPOCH time) to Date.

Default is false.

optional_parameters.name: s
optional_parameters.description:
Filter based on the following:

0 - Day
1 - Week
2 - Month

api_list.name: Get Show - Guest Cast Credits
api_list.description:
Retrieve all (show-level) cast credits for a person. 

A cast credit is a combination of both a show and a character. 

By default, only a reference to each show and character will be returned. 

However, this endpoint supports embedding, which means full information for the shows and characters can be included.

optional_parameters.name: isd
optional_parameters.description:
Choose whether additional information should be embedded in the result. 

Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Show - Crew Credits
api_list.description:
Retrieve all (show-level) crew credits for a person. 

A crew credit is combination of both a show and a crew type. 

By default, only a reference to each show will be returned. 

However, this endpoint supports embedding, which means full information for the shows can be included.

optional_parameters.name: isd
optional_parameters.description:
Choose whether additional information should be embedded in the result. 

Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Show - Cast Credits
api_list.description:
Retrieve all (show-level) cast credits for a person. 

A cast credit is a combination of both a show and a character. 

By default, only a reference to each show and character will be returned. 

However, this endpoint supports embedding, which means full information for the shows and characters can be included.

optional_parameters.name: isd
optional_parameters.description:
Choose whether additional information should be embedded in the result. 

Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Show - Person
api_list.description:
Retrieve all primary information for a given person. 

This endpoint allows embedding of additional information.

optional_parameters.name: icc
optional_parameters.description:
Choose whether additional information should be embedded in the result. 

Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Show - Guest Crew
api_list.description: Retrieve all guest crew working on an episode.

api_list.name: Get Show - Guest Cast
api_list.description: Retrieve all guest cast starring in an episode.

api_list.name: Get Show - Episode Main Information
api_list.description:
Retrieve all primary information for a given episode. 

This endpoint allows embedding of additional information.

optional_parameters.name: ai
optional_parameters.description: Choose whether additional information should be embedded in the result. Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Show - Crew
api_list.description:
A list of main crew for a show. 

Each crew item is a combination of a person and their crew type.

api_list.name: Get Show - Cast
api_list.description:
A list of main cast for a show. 

Each cast item is a combination of a person and a character. 

Items are ordered by importance, which is determined by the total number of appearances of the given character in this show.

api_list.name: Get Show - Main Information
api_list.description:
Retrieve all primary information for a given show. 

This endpoint allows embedding of additional information.

optional_parameters.name: ic
optional_parameters.description:
Choose whether additional information should be embedded in the result. 

Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Show - Episodes
api_list.description:
A complete list of episodes for the given show. 

Episodes are returned in their airing order and include full episode information. 

By default, specials are not included in the list.

optional_parameters.name: isps
optional_parameters.description: Choose whether specials should be embedded in the result. Default is false.

api_list.name: Get Show - Current Season
api_list.description:
A list of episodes in this season.  Specials are always included in this list. 

This endpoint allows embedding of additional information.

api_list.name: Get Show - Seasons
api_list.description:
A complete list of seasons for the given show. 

Seasons are returned in ascending order and contain the full information that's known about them.

api_list.name: Get Show - Episodes By Date
api_list.description:
Retrieve all episodes from a show that have aired on a specific date. 

This endpoint either returns an array of full episode information or a HTTP 404 response.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date; defaults to the current day

api_list.name: Get Show - Streaming Schedule of Episodes
api_list.description:
The web schedule is a complete list of episodes that air on web/streaming channels on a given date. 

Local Web Channels are only available in one specific country, while global Web Channels are available in multiple countries. 

To query both local and global Web Channels, leave out the country parameter. 

To query only local Web Channels, set country to an ISO country code. 

To query only global Web Channels, set country to an empty string.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date; defaults to the current day

optional_parameters.name: cc
optional_parameters.description:
An ISO 3166-1 code of the country; defaults to US.

Note: ISO country code for the United Kingdom is not UK, but GB.

api_list.name: Get Show - Schedule of Episodes
api_list.description:
The schedule is a complete list of episodes that air in a given country on a given date. Episodes are returned in the order in which they are aired, and full information about the episode and the corresponding show is included.

This endpoint will only return episodes that are tied to a specific country, either via a Network or via a local Web Channel such as HBO Max or Sky Go.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date; defaults to the current day

optional_parameters.name: cc
optional_parameters.description:
An ISO 3166-1 code of the country; defaults to US.

Note: ISO country code for the United Kingdom is not UK, but GB.

api_list.name: Get Name of People
api_list.description: Get Name of Actors, Actresses, Crew...etc.

api_list.name: Get Show - By IMDB Id
api_list.description: Search TV Show by the show's IMDB id.

api_list.name: Get Show - By TheTVDB Id
api_list.description: Search TV Show by the show's TheTVDB id.

api_list.name: Get Shows - By Title or Name
api_list.description: Search TV Shows by the show's name or title. A fuzzy algorithm is used (with a fuzziness value of 2), meaning that shows will be found even if your query contains small typos. Results are returned in order of relevancy (best matches on top) and contain each show's full information.

api_list.name: Get Show - By Title or Name
api_list.description:
Search TV Show by the show's name or title. 

Beware that if multiple shows exist with an identical name (for example, Top Gear), it's undefined which of them will be returned by this endpoint.

This endpoint allows embedding of additional information in the result.

optional_parameters.name: ee
optional_parameters.description: Choose whether additional information should be embedded in the result. Default is false.
